About Me

Short story professionally.

I work with backend technologies (NodeJS), Orchestration tooling (Terraform, AWS-EKS, Jenkins) and standard cloud management. I familiar with a full-stack workflow, cloud resource allocation and security, Docker, Kubernetes, Database technologies like MongoDB, AWS RDS and DynamoDB.

Name: Raymond Baguma

infra

I'm comfortable working with AWS cloud technologies between security, storage, VPC management, Ec2 management and auto scalability(both horizontally and vertically), AWS-EKS and the platform entire catalog

Testimonials

Jean-Jacques Djonga

Over the last 3 years I have worked with Raymond and what has been clear in that time frame is even within a company that is proclaimed to be data driven, Raymond clearl lives this.

Joo Romana

I worked with Raymond in Booking.com, he was in one of my team, and from the beginning I was impressed with his dedication, professionalism and intelligence, besides being a great person. He was continually a great performer.

Ivan Cazzamali

I worked with Raymond at Booking.com. While maintaining great working performance, as well as a friendly attitude during stressful situations, he continuously fed his curiosity towards programming and web development.

Max Yama

I met Raymond in 2018, and there is nothing I have but respect for this guy. I'm in management but this guy made feel like crossing over to software development. I'd recommend Raymond for any development role in any company.
